Package by.bsuir.mycoolstore.controller

Class CommonController

java.lang.Object
by.bsuir.mycoolstore.controller.CommonController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/") public class CommonController extends Object
The CommonController class is responsible for handling common requests and actions related to the application.

    • CommonController

      @Autowired public CommonController(FilmService fs, UserService us, FeedbackService fbs, CartService cs, LibraryService ls, MediaService ms)
      Constructs a CommonController with the specified services.
      Parameters:
      fs - The FilmService to be used.
      us - The UserService to be used.
      fbs - The FeedbackService to be used.
      cs - The CartService to be used.
      ls - The LibraryService to be used.
      ms - The MediaService to be used.
